Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[15:13] - - - -
[12] NOISE_SHAPING_EN rw 0x0 -
[11] INCREMENTAL_MODE_EN rw 0x0 -
[10:9] N_QUANTIZER_BITS rw 0x0 -
[8:5] DELAY_LINE_CTRL rw 0x0 -
[4:1] VCM_SINGLE_ENDED rw 0x0 -
[0] INPUT_MODE rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

NOISE_SHAPING_EN

If 0, run an NFFT conversion with SAR quantizer only. If 1, run with noise-shaping.

INCREMENTAL_MODE_EN

If 1, runs the ADC in incremental mode, meaning that the reset will be applied and the output will be filtered (up-counted). Else, runs in delta-sigma mode, and there will be no filtering at the output.

N_QUANTIZER_BITS

Number of bits to quantize, minus one. That is, the SAR will quantize N_QUANTIZER_BITS + 1.

DELAY_LINE_CTRL

SAR asynchronous delay control. Higher values will lead to longer SAR clock periods.

VCM_SINGLE_ENDED

VCM selection for single-ended mode. 0 will connect the single-ended value to ground, where all 1s will connect the single-ended value to VDD.

INPUT_MODE

Single-ended will only take inputs at the single-ended input of the PCB, which will compare to the programmed VCM value. Differential will read from the differential inputs.

enum input_mode_e
SINGLE_ENDED 0x0
DIFFERENTIAL 0x1
